results.headline: THREE MEN AND A LITTLE LADY (MOTION PICTURE)

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of 3 Men and A Little Lady

results.summary_short: Those bachelors and their moppet, but now the mom is moving away. Charming sequel, though not as engagingly gilded.

results.headline: WAITING FOR THE LIGHT (MOVIE)

results.summary_short: Town boosted by seeming miracle, time of Cuban missile crisis. Slight but interesting premise, spiced up by Shirley.

results.headline: Vincent and Theo (Movie)

results.summary_short: Vincent van Gogh and helpless brother, via Altman. Visually appealing but vapid and dispirited.

results.summary_short: Vet's hellish hallucinations. Slick and viscerally scary. Some loose ends aren't fatal.
